mapper.select: select o.id, o.corpname, o.corp_code from wx_mp_bind_info w left join organization o on w.org_id = o.corp_code where w.wx_uid = #{wxUid} and w.isbind = 1
select * from wx_mp_bind_info where wx_uid = #{wxUid} and org_id = #{orgId} and isbind = 1
select * from wx_mp_bind_info where wx_uid = #{wxUid} and org_id = #{orgId} and username = #{userid} and isbind = 1
mapper.update: update wx_mp_bind_info set isbind = 0, unbind_date = now() where wx_uid = #{wxUid}
mapper.insert: insert into wx_mp_bind_info(org_id, wx_uid, username, isbind) values (#{orgId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wxUid, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isbind, jdbcType=INTEGER})
